text: Akusangcole ngako oko bathengisa ngemiphefulo yabo kuko, ngokuthi bale ukukholwa koko kutyhilwe nguAllâh, bebangwa ngumona wokuba uAllâh ngoBabalo lwaKhe Ethe Wathumela uMyalezo waKhe kuye nabani na Amthandileyo kwiziCaka zaKhe. Ngokwenza oko bazibizele ingqumbo phezu kwengqumbo. Siya kuba lihlazo (elibi) isohlwayo sabo bangakholwayo
